TITLE: France's Emmanuel Macron criticizes Biden's 'Armageddon' warning: We must 'speak with prudence'
SUMMARY: French President Emmanuel Macron criticized President Joe Biden for warning of "Armageddon" as Russia threatens to use nuclear weapons.

TITLE: Female students shout at Iranian president to 'get lost' as he condemns protests
SUMMARY: Female protesters in Iran shouted down the country's president with chants of "get lost" as he condemned deadly protests after the death of a woman in police custody.

TITLE: US officials meet with Taliban in person for first time since drone strike killed Al Qaeda chief in Kabul
SUMMARY: United States officials met with leaders of the Taliban on Saturday for the first time since Al-Qaeda leader Ayman al-Zawahiri was killed by a U.S. drone strike in Kabul.

TITLE: Palestinian gunman kills woman Israeli soldier in Jerusalem
SUMMARY: The attack came hours after a pair of Palestinian teenagers were killed during an Israeli military raid in the West Bank; eleven were reportedly wounded.

TITLE: 3 Palestinians arrested following deadly attack on Israeli security checkpoint, manhunt ongoing
SUMMARY: Israeli authorities are searching for a gunman after a deadly shooting at an Israeli security checkpoint. Police have made three arrests and mobilized a large search party.

TITLE: After claim that possible new Israel gov’t will damage relations with US, Sen. Menendez stays silent
SUMMARY: A reported row over the inclusion of a controversial politician who could be part of a new Netanyahu government has led to friction between a prominent pro-Israel Democrat Senator and the former pm.

TITLE: Iranian police have killed nearly 200 people in rights protests — including children — watchdog group says
SUMMARY: Iranian police have slaughtered 185 people amid protests against the country's Islamist regime. Unrest erupted following the death of Mahsa Amini in police custody.

TITLE: Taiwan president to give speech pledging to strengthen 'combat power' amid increasing threats from China
SUMMARY: Taiwanese President Tsai Ing-wen is expected to give a speech on Monday pledging to bolster the island's “national defense combat power."

TITLE: Putin accuses Ukraine of 'terrorism' in Crimea bridge explosion
SUMMARY: Russian President Vladimir Putin on Sunday accused Ukraine of orchestrating a powerful explosion on a bridge linking Russia to Crimea, calling it an act of terrorism.

TITLE: North Korea's Kim Jong Un oversaw tactical nuclear military training
SUMMARY: North Korean dictator Kim Jong Un oversaw and guided the country's tactical nuclear operation unit training this past week, claims the North Korean News Agency

TITLE: Kyiv suffers explosions from apparent missile strikes
SUMMARY: Two explosions hit Ukraine's capital of Kyiv early Monday in what appears to be the result of missile strikes. No casualties have been reported so far.
